business.headline: Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower in volatile session; small and midcaps gainThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 28.21 points lower at 75,939.18, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 12.40 points lower at 22,932.90.

Reliance is India's most valuable company. Check top 10 firms in Hurun India 500The 2024 Burgundy Private Hurun India 500 report values Reliance at Rs 17.5 lakh crore. TCS comes in second at Rs 16.1 lakh crore, and HDFC Bank takes third place with Rs 14.2 lakh crore.

Dr Reddy's, Aurobindo Pharma: Why pharma stocks fell in early trade today?The Nifty Pharma index dropped as much as 2% in early trade. Sun Pharma fell nearly 2%, Dr Reddy's dropped as much as 4%, and Aurobindo Pharma sank almost 6%. Cipla shares also fell.

Unified Pension Scheme to roll out from April 1. Check eligibility and benefitsUnder the new pension scheme, government employees will contribute 10% of their basic salary along with DA, while the government's contribution will rise from the previous 14% to 18.5%.

entertainment.headline: Aashram 3 part 2 trailer: Bobby Deol is back as the menacing Baba NiralaThe much-awaited Aashram returns with Part 2 of Season 3, directed by Prakash Jha. The new season delves into themes of power, betrayal, and revenge.

New Matthew Perry documentary promises to dig deep into the Hollywood tragedyA new Matthew Perry documentary called Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy will be out later this month, wherein the makers will investigate the untimely death of the Friends star.

The First Frost review: Love, trauma, longing - new Chinese drama delivers it all Released-Thu Feb 20, 2025The First Frost review: This Chinese drama delves into the complexities of love, trauma, and longing, offering a poignant narrative that diverges from typical romance tropes. With its melancholic visuals and dual perspectives, it explores the tangled history between its protagonists, making it a compelling watch.

Uorfi Javed's mother on her bold fashion: Was shocked at first, but I support herUorfi Javed revealed her mother was the first in their family to try Botox. Her mother also recalled her reaction when she saw Uorfi's "new style".

Starring Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh in lead roles, the series will premiere on Prime Video on February 28.

Rihanna 'thankful, humbled' after A$AP Rocky found not guilty in shooting caseA$AP Rocky was declared not guilty in a felony assault trial, leading to an emotional embrace with Rihanna in court. After the verdict, the singer issued her first statement, expressing relief.

Watch: Arijit Singh attends father's video call during live concertArijit Singh's live concert in Chandigarh was made memorable by a surprise video call from his father during his performance. The singer shared heartfelt moments from the event on Instagram, expressing gratitude to his fans.

Pics: Singer Anuv Jain married, shares photos with wifeSinger Anuv Jain, popular for songs like Baarishein, is now married. He shared photos from the wedding and pre-wedding festivities on social media.

From gripping thrillers to heartwarming romances, the lineup promises stellar performances and captivating stories.

general news.headline: Rekha Gupta: BJP gives Delhi a She MRekha Gupta, first-time MLA from Shalimar Bagh, is the next Delhi Chief Minister. She will be Delhi's fourth woman chief minister.

Who is Rekha Gupta, and why BJP chose her Delhi CMThe BJP has picked Rekha Gupta, a three-time councillor, as the Chief Minister of Delhi. In picking Gupta, who started her political career with the Delhi University Students Union elections, the BJP has tried to cement a legacy and convey a message to its women voter base.

Wasting time? Tribunal slams UP body for Sangam report based on old samplesThe National Green Tribunal reprimanded Uttar Pradesh Pollution Control Board for submitting an affidavit on Sangam river water quality based on old samples.

Move fast or you won't have country left: Trump's message to 'dictator' ZelenskyyDonald Trump launched a scathing attack on Volodymyr Zelenskyy, calling him a "dictator without elections" and blaming him for the Russia-Ukraine war, amid raising tensions.

iPhone 16e launched in India: Price, full specsApple has officially launched the iPhone 16e in India. The device comes with a starting price of Rs 59,900. Here are full specs, features, design and India price details.

Parvesh Verma, Kapil Mishra among 6 likely Delhi cabinet ministers: SourcesParvesh Verma and Kapil Mishra are likely to take oath as Delhi cabinet ministers tomorrow, alongside four other BJP leaders, sources told India Today TV.

US Senator goes after Musk over DOGE, internet hits back with PayPal referenceUS Senator John Fetterman shared a news report about DOGE allegedly trying to access private taxpayer data. The $21-million USAID joke, and it isn't on IndiaUSAID used $21 million of American taxpayer money to boost voter turnout in India, according to Elon Musk's DOGE. India has been spending more on elections than the US and sees a better voter turnout too. That's the $21-million joke. On a serious note, the money could have been used to interfere in India's electoral process.

Car crash injures 3 of family, leads to discovery of 3 bodies at home in KolkataThree members of a family were found dead at their home while three other members were involved in a road accident in Kolkata.

In an interview with Fox News alongside former President Donald Trump, Musk said their return to earth had been postponed to a "ridiculous degree".

Arshdeep Singh over Harshit Rana to replace Jasprit Bumrah: Ricky PontingChampions Trophy: Ricky Ponting backed Arshdeep Singh over Harshit Rana as India's best replacement for injured Jasprit Bumrah in the Champions Trophy, citing Arshdeep's control and experience in white-ball cricket as key factors for India's bowling attack.

Is the Champions Trophy still relevant in the age of T20 cricket dominance?The Champions Trophy returns to the cricket calendar after an eight-year hiatus. Despite the dominance of T20 cricket, ODI cricket still holds significance through marquee tournaments like the Champions Trophy and World Cup. Multi-nation events could be key to reviving its relevance in a crowded cricketing calendar.

New Zealand has squad depth for Champions Trophy despite injuries: BondDespite injury setbacks, Shane Bond believes New Zealand's squad depth remains strong, emphasising their all-rounders' impact and confidence from recent triumphs ahead of the Champions Trophy opener against Pakistan in Karachi on February 19.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".
